# undoMenuTitle(forUndoActionName:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the localized title of the Undo menu command for the identified action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func undoMenuTitle(forUndoActionName actionName: String) -> String
```

## Parameters

- **actionName**: The name of the undo action.

## Return Value

The localized title of the undo menu item.

## Discussion

Override this method if you want to customize the localization behavior. This method is invoked by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoMenuItemTitle].

## Getting and localizing the menu item title

- **undoMenuItemTitle**: The title of the Undo menu command, such as Undo Paste.
- **redoMenuItemTitle**: The title of the Redo menu command, such as Redo Paste.
- **redoMenuTitle(forUndoActionName:)**: Returns the localized title of the Redo menu command for the identified action.
